title: Did Alexandria Ocacio-Cortez say under capitalism, Man Obres Man. Under socialism, he's just resisting?
subtitle: It seems unlikely that a 29-year-old child may have been the originator of an "old Soviet joke" for several decades.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: The newly elected Democratic Party, the Republic of Alexandria Okasio-Cortez, said: "Under capitalism, man oppresses man. Under socialism, it's just the opposite."
